General.Name: Grg Metrology
General.Description: GRG Metrology & Test Group Co., Ltd. operates as a third-party metrology and testing company. Its services include measurement and calibration; electromagnetic compatibility testing; chemical analysis; reliability and environmental testing; environmental testing; and food and agricultural products testing. The company serves car, aviation, rail, ship, communication, electricity, food, agriculture, medical, textile, petrochemical, and electronic appliances industries. The company was formerly known as Guang Zhou GRG Metrology & Test Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Guangzhou, China. GRG Metrology & Test Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangzhou Radio Group Co., Ltd.
